itunes:title: FEB 01 2022 - TRUCKER UPRISING SPECIAL!
title: FEB 01 2022 - TRUCKER UPRISING SPECIAL!
description:
The truck convoy is still blocking the Canadian-U.S. border in protest of vaccine mandates and police are expected to take action, Trudeau has stated that he will not meet with truckers because of their ‘hateful rhetoric’, meanwhile new data states that 54% of Canadians surveyed want all COVID mandates lifted, and truckers in the U.S. are following the lead of Canada and are scheduled to start their own convoy against the vaccine mandate that will go from California to D.C.



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec
content:encoded:
The truck convoy is still blocking the Canadian-U.S. border in protest of vaccine mandates and police are expected to take action, Trudeau has stated that he will not meet with truckers because of their ‘hateful rhetoric’, meanwhile new data states that 54% of Canadians surveyed want all COVID mandates lifted, and truckers in the U.S. are following the lead of Canada and are scheduled to start their own convoy against the vaccine mandate that will go from California to D.C.



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec
itunes:author: Turning Point USA
